notAvailables.description: Map of roomTypeId ‚Üí not available info

splits.description: Splits available for this room type

originalRoomTypeId.description: ID of the original room type

documentPortrait.description: Portrait image of the customer's document

documentFront.description: Front image of the customer's document

documentBack.description: Back image of the customer's document

request.example: Please prepare the room for a VIP guest

start.description: Start date of the to-do item

end.description: End date of the to-do item

bookingId.description: ID of the booking associated with the to-do item

checked.description: Whether the to-do item is checked

mon.description: Indicates if the room is cleaned on Monday

tue.description: Indicates if the room is cleaned on Tuesday

wed.description: Indicates if the room is cleaned on Wednesday

thu.description: Indicates if the room is cleaned on Thursday

fri.description: Indicates if the room is cleaned on Friday

sat.description: Indicates if the room is cleaned on Saturday

sun.description: Indicates if the room is cleaned on Sunday

weekDaysClean.description: Indicates the days of the week the room is cleaned

groupQuantity.description: Quantity of rooms in the booking group

nights.description: Number of nights for the booking

locked.description: Indicates if the booking is locked

imported.description: Indicates if the booking is imported

companyId.description: ID of the company associated with the booking

otaId.description: OTA ID associated with the booking

guests.title: Customer
guests.description: List of guests associated with the booking

isSaleDirect.description: Indicates if the sale is direct

companyId.description: Company ID, required if isNewCompany is false and customerType is Agency or Company

isActive.description: Whether a manual promo code is applied

promoCode.description: Promo code in the format type-value-id-code

isActive.description: Whether the release date is tentative

tentative.description: Settings related to tentative release date

sendEmail.description: Whether to send a confirmation email to the host

otaId.description: OTA ID associated with the booking

requestNotes.example: Please prepare a crib for the baby.
requestNotes.description: Special requests or notes from the host

description.example: This is a sample product description.

discountType.description: Type of discount applied to the product

discountValue.description: Value of the discount applied to the product

discountCalculated.description: Calculated discount amount for the product

userId.description: ID of the user who registered the payment

prePay.description: Indicates if this is a pre-payment

isRefunded.description: Indicates whether the payment is refunded

refundId.description: Refund ID associated with the invoice

paymentsIds.description: List of payment IDs associated with the invoice

isCredit.description: Indicates whether the invoice is a credit note

invoiceWasSent.description: Indicates when the invoice email was sent

bookingsIds.description: List of booking IDs associated with the invoice

signed.description: Indicates whether the invoice is signed

total.description: Total amount of the proforma invoice

isCredit.description: Indicates whether the proforma is a credit note

proformaWasSent.description: Timestamp of when the proforma was sent to the client

bookingsIds.description: List of booking IDs included in the proforma invoice

items.description: Details of invoiced items grouped by item ID

customerType.description: Customer type associated with the proforma invoice

pcode.description: Property code associated with the webhook

eventTypes.description: List of event types that trigger the webhook

isAvailable.description: Whether the webhook is currently available

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the webhook was created

webhookId.description: ID of the webhook being tested

url.description: URL where the webhook test request was sent

eventType.description: Event type used for the test

payload.description: Payload sent to the webhook endpoint during the test

statusCode.description: HTTP status code returned by the webhook endpoint during the test

errorMessage.description: Error message returned during the test, if any

durationMs.description: Duration of the webhook test request in milliseconds

id.description: Unique identifier of the log entry

webhookId.description: ID of the webhook that triggered this log entry

url.description: URL where the webhook request was sent

eventType.description: Event type that triggered the webhook

payload.description: JSON payload sent to the webhook endpoint

statusCode.description: HTTP status code returned by the webhook endpoint

errorMessage.description: Error message returned by the webhook endpoint, only present when the request failed

durationMs.description: Duration of the webhook call in milliseconds

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the log entry was created
